amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of Export-Import Bank assistance for exports to companies that employ child labor.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of Ex-Im Bank assistance for companies that employ child labor (according to U.S. child labor standards), or for companies that have not made a binding commitment not to employ children in such a manner.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Vento amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
